thread.title: Mada Venkateswara Rao, the comedian, dies at 65
thread.title_full: Mada Venkateswara Rao, the comedian, dies at 65 - Bangalore Mirror

author: bangaloremirror.com
title: Mada Venkateswara Rao, the comedian, dies at 65
text:
Telugu comedian Mada Venkateswara Rao breathed his last in a private hospital in Hyderabad, a family source said. He was 65.
"He passed away on Saturday night while undergoing treatment for respiratory problems," the source said.
Born in 1950, the veteran actor shot to fame with his portrayal of an eunuch in filmmaker Dasari Narayana Rao's 1977 film Chillara Kottu Chitemma. Before becoming a full-fledged actor, he was employed in the electricity department. With over 300 movies to his credit, he had starred in films such as Mutyala Muggu, Lambadolla Ramdasu, Mayadari Malli-gadu and Siviah.
